title: All About Taylor Lautner’s Wife Taylor Dome
text:
Twilight’s Taylor Lautner found his other half in another Taylor. Taylor Dome has officially changed her last name to “Lautner” since their marriage, but to help with some confusion, she’ll be referred here by her maiden name. It’s an issue they deal with themselves, as they’re happy to joke about. In fact, when Lautner appeared in a Taylor Swift music video, the three Taylors recreated the Spider-Man meme about finding your doppëlganger.
The Lautners are very open about their lives and marriage, and even have their own podcast together, The Squeeze. But here’s some info on Dome and how her and Lautner’s marriage came to be.
Dome is a registered nurse, completing her studies in 2019. She has also been working on her profile as an influencer, launching LEMONS by Tay in January 2022, a site dedicated to self-care and mental health. 
She was also once a huge Twilight fan. She shared a hilarious throwback photo of herself in November 2020 wearing a Twilight sweatshirt with the hashtag “#tbt #twilightforever.”
In June 2022, she shared a video about who her childhood crush was, and it turns out Dome was once Team Edward.
And yet, she ended up with Jacob Black. Lautner commented on the post, “Bout time I won something.” 
Dome is a good friend of Makena Moore, Lautner’s sister, and she introduced them.
“My sister Makena actually introduced us,” he said in an interview. “She called me and said, ‘Dude, I found your future wife. You need to meet this girl.’ And the rest is history.”
While doing an interview on The Kelly Clarkson Show in 2022, he told Clarkson, “It’s just me and my sister so we’re super close, and she always said that she was gonna introduce me to my future wife, and I was like, ‘Sure.’”
At the time of the intro, Lautner had taken a break from acting.
“I wanted to take a step back and enjoy life and spend some time with my family and friends,” he told People. “And I met my fiancée out of it, so it all worked out.”
They connected during a game night, he explained. 
“I love game nights. She’s [Moore] like, ‘Throw a game night, invite me and some of my friends over, and I’ll bring Tay. She’ll just be one of them, and you guys can just meet,’” he said. “We hit it off, and the rest is history.”
They shared that they were dating in 2018, and Lautner proposed in November 2021. They were married on November 11, 2022 in at Epoch Estate Wines outside of Paso Robles, California. Lautner wore a Dolce & Gabbana tuxedo, and Dome wore a Winnie Couture A-line gown.
Lautner described his proposal to Access Hollywood, saying, “She always has said, ‘I don’t want anything special. I don’t want anything big and grand. Do it in the kitchen...I love cooking, so I make us food all the time in the kitchen and we just eat at the counter. And she’s like, ‘One night after we eat in the kitchen, that’s all I want. Simple.’”
But he couldn’t stop himself from doing a little more.
“I got tons of flowers and candles and a sign. So when she came home at the end of the day, after a long day of work, she walked into that,” he said. “It was a lovely surprise.”
He added, “It actually did take her a little longer than expected to say ‘yes’ because she was weeping so hard. She couldn't even walk up to me. So I was on my mark and I have to leave the mark to go get her to lift her up from crying … It took a sec, but it was super sweet.”
For Dome’s 26th birthday, Lautner gave her a tattoo session. They got matching tattoos of their wedding date “11.11.22” on their left wrists.
They made their first red carpet appearance together in April 2022, at the CMT Awards.
On The Kelly Clarkson Show, Lautner shared his wife’s plans to officially change her last name joking, “Cause we already share one name, so it’s gonna be extra complicated,” adding, “I’m a narcissist.” 
On Wednesday, October 4, the two Taylors attended the Inaugural Rare Impact Fund Benefit which was hosted by Selena Gomez. They wore chic color coordinated outfits in black, with Lautner donning a two piece velvet ensemble with satin details and short sleeves and a pair of matching black shoes. His wife was in a strapless black gown with a thigh-high split up the skirt. She had a black-and-white blazer hung over her shoulders. On her feet were a pair of nude high-heeled sandals.
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Ciara and Russell Wilson's Complete Relationship Timeline
text:
It seems like Ciara and Russell Wilson have been together forever, but they actually met in 2015, and were married only a year after they first connected. Together, the musical artist and Broncos star share three children: their daughter Sienna Princess, their son Win Harrison Wilson, and Ciara's son Future Zahir Wilburn from her former relationship with the rapper Future, whom Wilson treats as his own. 
Here's their complete relationship timeline so far.
The couple met on March 26, 2015, while at a basketball game at the University of Wisconsin. BET reports that Wilson asked Ciara out for dinner, seeing if she could meet him after a business meeting, but she said it was too late. He changed his plans.
“I completely forgot about the 10:30 [P.M.] dinner,” he said. “Next thing I knew, it was 12:00 [A.M.], 12:30 [A.M.], and I was sold on you.” 
Only a month later, they made their first official appearance together at the White House, during an event for Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and his wife, Akie Abe. 
Things went well, and soon, they were walking the red carpet at the BET Awards. 
The couple made headlines when Wilson shared that they had decided to remain celibate until marriage. 
“I told somebody that’s the girl I want to be with before I even met her,” he explained during an interview with San Diego's The Rock Church. “Before I met her, I was like, ‘I’m probably going to end up with Ciara.’”
He continued, “She was in the dressing room getting ready to go before she went on stage, and she was sitting there, and God spoke to me and said, ‘I need you to lead her.’ And I was like, ‘Really?’ And he was like, ‘No, I want you to lead her.’ So I told her, ‘What would you do if we took all of that extra stuff off the table and just did it Jesus's way?’”
He added, “I ain't going to lie to you all now. I need you all to pray for us. I know you've seen her on the screen. If there's a 10, she's a 15.” 
The couple made an appearance at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Sports Awards at UCLA, which Wilson was hosting.
Ciara told Cosmopolitan more about their celibacy decision, saying, “You get to hug and you get to have a nice good kiss, but you have to be careful not to go too far so you don't end up in the place you're trying to avoid being in. Strong, strong, strong, strong! Just the strongest resistance to temptation.”
In another interview that month with People, Ciara said, “I’m not gonna lie. I’m human, so it is not easy, especially when I look at him, and I think he is the most beautiful thing I’ve ever seen—that I’ve ever laid my eyes on, to be honest.”
They also attended the pre-GRAMMY Gala together and posed for this iconic photo.
A year after meeting, Wilson proposed to Ciara while they were on a trip in the Seychelles with a 16-carat custom diamond ring, according to Us Weekly. 
“She said Yes!!! Since Day 1 I knew you were the one. No Greater feeling... #TrueLove @Ciara,” he posted on Instagram on March 11, confirming their engagement.
They were married a few months later on July 6 at Peckforton Castle in Cheshire, England, surrounded by friends and family. She wore a Roberto Cavalli gown with custom embroidery, bell lace sleeves, and a laced-up bodice, while Wilson was in a Giorgio Armani suit, People reported at the time. Celebs at the event included Kelly Rowland, Jennifer Hudson, and La La Anthony. 
“We are The Wilsons!” Ciara wrote over a photo from the day.
Ciara told People, “Our wedding was like a fairytale... We loved the countryside. We looked at a venue in the U.S., but we also looked abroad, and England just seemed magical and perfect.”
She added, “This is the happiest I have ever been.”
That fall, the couple announced they were expecting. Ciara shared the news on her 31st birthday, writing on Instagram, “On this special Birthday I received an abundance of love from friends and family.. and I'm excited to Finally share one of the Greatest Gifts of All that God could give... 👶🏽🍼💃🏽☺️❤️”
Wearing a floor-length red velvet gown from Jovani Signature to the Vanity Fair Oscar Party in February 2017, Ciara's pregnancy was very visible, and she looked radiant.
Their daughter Sienna was born on April 29, 2017.
“Dear Sienna Princess Wilson, No matter how big the wave, we will always be your calm in the storm. We Love You. Love, Mommy & Daddy,” Ciara wrote on Instagram.
They shared the first photos of Sienna months later.
Ciara told E! that since marriage and welcoming a new child, her home has “been full of so much life and love.”
“He's been such an incredible father since day one,” she said of Wilson's parenting skills. “He's so loving and very patient. He also likes to have fun—he's very spontaneous and we just have a good time as a family... He inspires me, he's so driven and very ambitious, and he's always working hard whether he's on the field or off the field.”
She added, “He's always trying to make an impact in any way that he can. It's really inspiring to watch and to have a partner that has that kind of ambition. I'm also a very ambitious person, I'm very driven...it really just flows.”  
Two years after their wedding, the couple went on an official honeymoon in Botswana, Africa.
“I could wake up like this every morning,” the singer wrote over a safari video.
Shortly after, the couple launched Why Not You productions to develop both scripted and unscripted TV and movie projects. 
“While we work in different fields in our day-to-day, we are excited to come together to collaborate and create stories that we hope will touch people’s lives,” they said in a joint statement to The Hollywood Reporter. “We are both storytellers at heart and we want to be able to share stories that uplift people and inspire others to create positive change. That’s ultimately what we want this company to represent.” 
While promoting her new album Beauty Marks on The View, Ciara shared more about her relationship. 
“When you allow yourself to be vulnerable, you become your strongest,” she said. “When I met the love of my life it was not only loving me, it was to love my son.”
Later that month, she told Access Hollywood, “You know my husband’s pretty awesome and you know it’s been an incredible journey...Time goes by so fast and we’ve been having the time of our lives. We call it organized chaos because obviously with him doing football and me doing music, the worlds are both moving fast and kinda like in two different directions, but sometimes parallel at the same time.”   
In January 2020, Ciara announced she and Wilson were expecting again. 
“Number 3,” she captioned a shot of herself in a bathing suit featuring a baby bump.
On July 23, their son Win Harrison was born. 
“Happy Birthday WIN!!! Mommy & Daddy Love You!” Wilson wrote on Instagram.
Ciara also shared a video of herself with the new arrival.
Ciara honored her husband at the 2021 Met Gala by wearing his jersey number in Seahawks green on a gown by Dundas while wearing his Super Bowl ring from Super Bowl XLVIII and carriying a football clutch covered in crystals
The couple released a children's book together titled Why Not You?, encouraging kids to dream big. It is an extension of their shared Why Not You Foundation.
Ciara told People that young Future loves football, and Wilson has been helping him train.
“He's all about the details. He's all about the technique,” she said. “He's firm with love though...He's all about coming back with love and so it's beautiful.”
Ciara brought Future and Sienna to watch Wilson play for the Denver Broncos in Las Vegas, Nevada.
At the end of a difficult season with the Broncos, Ciara wrote her husband a loving message of support on Instagram.
“This season has been a roller coaster ride like no other… I've watched you endure so much and keep your head up high through it all! Your faith, belief, and confidence never wavered!” she wrote. “What I do know is a Winner is someone that gets back up when they're knocked down, someone who doesn't stop believing. Someone who embraces adversity and stays neutral through it all. Someone who can't be influenced by the words or opinions of others. Someone who loves loving others, serving others, and is always there for his family. All of that you are!” 
Ciara announced she was pregnant with her and Wilson's third child together and her fourth overall. She wrote on Instagram, “‘You look at me like that again, we make another kid… You my heart I’m your rib’ ”
A source told People that Ciara and Wilson were looking to keep expanding their family. “She loves being a mother so this is what she loves doing,” the source said. “This is what she has always wanted, and Russ too. They've always wanted a lot of kids.”
Ciara made an appearance on the Call Her Daddy podcast in October, and discussed her pregnancy and plans for the future with Wilson. First, she told host Alex Cooper about the early days of their courtship and keeping things private to start.
“It was the best thing for the both of us, we felt,” she said. “Because even though we were meeting as friends and all that stuff, my son was there and my dad was there.”
She added, “We were, like, talking and talking and talking and it was crazy. Everything that we talked about, like, we were aligned on...I knew that I'd never felt what I felt in that moment.”
Ciara also talked about Wilson as a dad.
“He's an amazing father,” she said. “Watching him with all of our kids—it is one of the sweetest things. It's one of the sexiest things, to be honest with you. I'm just saying, ladies, when a man jumps in and changes the diaper, and he's pulling up to teacher-parent conferences, it's like, ‘Ooh!’”
She added, “There's something about a man turning on that part of them, like, they're being a man for you but they're also being a man for your family. There's no better feeling than knowing that.”
Cooper joked about the pair planning baby number five, but Ciara quickly responded, “Don't get crazy now. Let's go one baby at a time.”
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: A Complete Timeline of Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson's Relationship
text:
Khloé Kardashian and Tristan Thompson were first linked together in 2016, and have had many ups and downs during the past six years. In that time, they had two children together, a four-year-old daughter named True Thompson and a boy born via surrogate in summer 2022. His name has not yet been revealed publicly. 
Relationship status-wise, Kardashian and Thompson are off for now but have been on-off romantically throughout their history.
If you've found their relationship confusing, this timeline of their big moments together might help to keep everything straight. 
August 2016
Khloé and Tristan were first spotted together leaving LA's Bootsy Bellows nightclub in the summer of 2016. Khloé later explained that they were set up on a surprise blind date by their mutual friend Brandon Jennings.
“I was at the Bel-Air hotel. [Tristan] came to the dinner because I didn't want to go on a blind date, so Brandon kind of ambushed the blind date,” she said. “So, I had a bunch of people, and he brought him, and we just connected.”
September 2016
A month later,  Khloé and Tristan headed to Mexico for a couple's getaway and were photographed holding hands in Miami that same month, eventually attending Flo Rida’s birthday party at LIV together.
October 2016
In October, the couple coordinated their costumes for Halloween, going as Marvel's Storm and the Black Panther.
November 2016
By November of that year, Khloé was living part-time in Cleveland to be close to Tristan, which she raved about during an interview with Jimmy Kimmel.
“I live [in Los Angeles], but I’m [in Cleveland] very often,” she said. “I actually really do [like being in Cleveland]. I actually really like it. I like just having my routine and being a little more under the radar. It’s nice.”
December 2016
In December, Khloé shared a photo of herself and Tristan in matching camouflage coats, embracing in a hallway. She captioned the photo, “Him,” adding a heart emoji.
January 2017
The couple celebrated the new year together, kissing at midnight and sharing the pics on Instagram.
March 2017
By 2017, Tristan was showing up in episodes of Keeping Up With the Kardashians. During his first appearance, he was at Khloé's side when she headed to a Kanye West concert to meet the family, annoying her sister Kim Kardashian.
April 2017
In an interview with Es Magazine, Khloé said she had “never been in this type of love.” 
“I would love to have a family. We’ve talked about it … I know for a fact that he would be an impeccable father,” she said. “I definitely want to be a mom. But I don’t put the pressure on it. It’s not like, ‘The clock is ticking.’ I feel in my soul it will happen.”
June 2017
In June, Khloé posted more kissing pics with Tristan, calling him her “king.”
August 2017
She went with a kissing pic again to celebrate their one year anniversary.
December 2017
The couple announced that they were expecting in late 2017.
“My greatest dream realized!” Khloé wrote on Instagram. “We are having a baby! I had been waiting and wondering but God had a plan all along. He knew what He was doing. I simply had to trust in Him and be patient. I still at times can't believe that our love created life! Tristan, thank you for loving me the way that you do! Thank you for treating me like a Queen! Thank you for making me feel beautiful at all stages! Tristan, most of all, Thank you for making me a MOMMY!!!”
She continued, “You have made this experience even more magical than I could have envisioned! I will never forget how wonderful you've been to me during this time! Thank you for making me so happy my love! Thank you to everyone for the love and positive vibes! I know we've been keeping this quiet but we wanted to enjoy this between our family and close friends as long as we could privately. To enjoy our first precious moments just us. Thank you all for understanding. I am so thankful, excited, nervous, eager, overjoyed and scared all in one! But it's the best bundle of feelings I've ever felt in my life!”
January 2018
To celebrate the beginning of another new year together, Khloé posted a picture of her and Tristan captioned “mom and dad.”
February 2018
The couple had a huge Valentine's Day celebration together just months before the birth of True.
On April 12, 2018, True was born, but the huge event was somewhat overshadowed by videos of Tristan appearing on TMZ and the Daily Mail, showing him being intimate with another woman. The story broke just before True's birth, and Page Six identified the woman Tristan was seen kissing at PH-D Lounge in NYC as 28-year-old model Lani Blair.
Blair was reportedly seen at his NBA team's hotel, the Four Seasons, and spent “four hours” there before they headed to Soho House together, then returned to the hotel around 5 A.M. the next morning.
Witnesses told Page Six that Thompson was “looking around cautiously…and holding the door for her” at the hotel. Blair was later seen leaving on Monday night 8 P.M. with a Louis Vuitton overnight bag.
Shortly after The Mail's story was released, TMZ produced another video dated from back in October, of Thompson with two other women.
The next month,  it was reported that Khloé and Tristan were trying to work things out. The new parents were spotted at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland as Tristan's team the Cavaliers played against the Toronto Raptors, TMZ reported.
Khloe Kardashian Shows Up at Cavaliers Game to Support Tristan Thompson https://t.co/FZeCm8FXKQ
They were also spotted having lunch at TownHall restaurant in Cleveland.
People reported Tristan and Khloé were together again in the house, with a source saying, “Khloé seems happy. She loves being a mom. She’s focused on keeping her family together. She seems okay with Tristan—there’s no talk of a split.”
“When she wants something to work, she will make it work,” the source explained. “Her family’s issue with Tristan is that they think he won’t change. But Khloé isn’t listening to this. She has been very firm with Tristan, and she believes he wants to keep his family together as well.”
Khloé commented for the first time on Twitter about her relationship in response to a fan wondering why she didn't leave “that wasteman Tristan.” The fan wrote, “She preaches about women knowing their self worth and when to walk away, but when it's time to walk the walk, she's a hypocrite.”
Kardashian responded directly to the fan, tweeting, “Not exactly Queen Persia, you have no knowledge of what goes on in our household or the enormous rebuilding this takes to even coexist. I’m proud of my strength. I appreciate your opinion and I hope you hold that same opinion to everyone else who has stayed in situations.” 
Things apparently were rocky, with an insider telling People and Us Weekly that Khloé and Tristan were together but growing apart.
“Khloé and Tristan are still not fully okay,” Us’ source said. “They act like they are when they’re in front of others, but it’s all a show at this point.”
A second source told Us that Tristan was unhappy. 
“Tristan is feeling trapped in a bad relationship. He’s no longer going with Khloé for [couple’s therapy] sessions. He just didn’t feel it was helping to discuss sh-t that happened months ago.”
Khloé was frustrated too, according to the source.
“Khloé carried his child and is much more in the limelight than he is, and she doesn’t think he understands the consequences of his decisions,” the source explained. "She thinks the cheating scandal is a way bigger deal than he does, and he doesn’t fully understand the repercussions of his actions affecting not only him and Khloé but the entire family as a whole."
She was particularly sensitive because her ex-husband Lamar Odom was guilty of the same transgression. A source told People that Tristan was having trouble adjusting to being in the limelight.
“When he got with Khloé, he tried to adapt to the best of his ability, but he struggled with being part of such a high-profile family and crossed lines he shouldn’t have,” People's source said. “He wasn’t expecting such major backlash from the public and it’s been a lot for him to handle.”
Khloé spent Thanksgiving in Cleveland with Tristan and True, away from her family. Fans were suspicious that the Kardashians and Jenner don't want him around. 
She responded to that by tweeting, “Y’all are reaching now. I’ve spent the past 3 years in Cleveland for Thanksgiving. Not sure why people are trying to create drama between my family and I. My sisters and I are perfectly fine thank you! All of their families were able to travel but TT being in season, he can not.”
Y’all are reaching now. I’ve spent the past 3years in Cleveland for Thanksgiving. Not sure why people are trying to create drama between my family and I. My sisters and I are perfectly fine thank you! All of their families were able to travel but TT being in season, he can not
She later added, “The truth is never as fun as some story some of you like to create. So here we goooooooooooo!! Happy Thanksgiving I guess lol.”
TMZ reports that the couple had split over allegations that Tristan was seen kissing Jordyn Woods, Kylie Jenner's best friend at the time, just after spending Valentine's Day with Khloé.
The basketball star was reportedly seen “snuggling up” and “making out” with Jordyn Woods at a house party, and when Khloé found out, the source said, “she has had enough.”
“FAKE NEWS,” Tristan initially tweeted just after the news broke.
The week before, E! reported that though they were technically together, it didn't necessarily look good.
“She chooses not to worry about it or to classify their relationship anymore,” E!'s source explained, saying Khloé was mostly in Los Angeles while Tristan toured with his team, and that she is “very happy with things the way they are and feels very fulfilled. She doesn't need to think about what's up with Tristan or what he's doing out on the road like she used to.” 
Later that month, Woods appeared on Red Table Talk episode with Jada Pinkett Smith for Facebook Watch, where she described her encounter with him. She said, “But, on the way out [of Tristan's house] he did kiss me. No passion, no nothing. On the way out he just kissed me. It was a kiss on the lips. No tongue kiss, no making out. Nothing. I don't think he's wrong either, because I allowed myself to be in this position.”
She continued, “I didn't know how to feel. I was like, ‘That didn't just happen,’ because I was leaving already so I walked out immediately after. And I got in the car and was like, ‘No, that didn't happen,’ I [told him] I need to go. I was in shock.”
Khloé tweeted out that she did not blame Woods the way she blamed Tristan for what happened.
Tristan is equally to blame but Tristan is the father of my child. Regardless of what he does to me I won’t do that to my daughter. He has been addressing this situation PRIVATELY. If Tristan were to lie publicly about what conspired,then yes I would address him publicly as well
This has been an awful week & I know everyone is sick of hearing about it all (as am I). I’m a rollercoaster of emotions & have said things I shouldn’t have. Honestly, Tristan cheating on me & humiliating me, wasn’t such a shock as the first time.
What’s been harder & more painful is being hurt by someone so close to me. Someone whom I love & treat like a little sister. But Jordyn is not to be blamed for the breakup of my family. This was Tristan’s fault.
I have to move on with my life & count my blessings, my family, my health, & my beautiful baby True.
People interviewed a source who said that Khloé is “great.”
“Her heartbreak seems to have passed and her mood is much lighter,” they continued. “Although she really wanted Tristan to come around, grow up and be a man, she seems to have realized that she’s much better off now. Everyone is happy to see her happier.”
They added, “Khloé isn’t dating, but at least she’s able to talk and joke about dating. She realizes with True around now, she just needs to be super picky. True [Kardashian's daughter with Thompson] will always be Khloé’s life and number one. Khloé is obsessed with her little girl. She really is the most wonderful mom.”
Tristan spoke out against rumors that his relationship with Khloé overlapped with his and ex-girlfriend Jordan Craig's relationship. Craig was pregnant with the couple's child Prince when he first started seeing Khloé.
“When I met Khloe I was SINGLE,” he wrote on Twitter. “The negative comments that are constantly being directed towards her are unnecessary. She does not deserve all this backlash for my wrong doings. Both Khloè and Jordan have been nothing but great mothers to my kids.”
During a radio interview with Ryan Seacrest, Khloe stated that she doesn’t hold a grudge against her ex or Jordyn Woods.
“I’m not someone who holds a grudge. If I do that it’s only going to affect me,” she said. “That chapter is closed for me. I want all of us to move on and to be happy, successful people. I just want everyone to just be better people with each day. That’s genuinely how I feel.”
She added, “I know everybody makes mistakes. I think it’s how you handle it, and I think apologies need to be as loud as your disrespect was or to me, it’s not sincere. I’m forgiving. I’m forgiven.” 
“We’re all human beings and we’re all figuring out life,” she said. “Stuff happens and people make mistakes, and as long as it doesn’t define who they are—as long as they don’t make those choices define them and they try to evolve and become better people—we’re all gonna survive. We all learn from it.”
In July of the following year after spending some time in lockdown together, it was rumored by People that the former couple was “giving their relationship another try. Tristan is working hard to prove himself and has been a great dad to True.”
A second source said they “acted like [they] were back together” during her birthday that summer, and he wrote a glowing tribute to her on social media.
"I’m wise enough now to know, you came into my life to show me just what it means to be an incredible person," he stated. "I appreciate how I am able to learn from and grow because of you. I thank God for the beautiful and loving woman you are to everyone, especially our daughter True. You deserve the world Koko! True and I love you mama. Happy Birthday @khloekardashian ❤️🥳”
By February 2021, the pair were supposedly back in a committed relationship, and a source told Entertainment Tonight, “Khloé forgives Tristan at this point, but she will never forget. They are back to being committed, are still in love and giving their relationship another chance and hoping that it will succeed this time around. Tristan has been paying extra attention to Khloe and True and has been calling, FaceTiming, texting and sending photos all the time to check in when they are not physically together. He hasn’t been going out late at night with the boys or other girls.”
A month later, they went Instagram official for a second time, with Khloé wishing him a happy 30th birthday today on Instagram.
She wrote to her boyfriend, “The ones that are meant to be are the ones who go through everything that is designed to tear them apart and they come out even stronger than they were before. Thank you for showing me everything you said you would. For the father you are. For the best friend I have in you. I’m thankful that I can do absolutely nothing with you and it feels like everything. I hope you know today and everyday how loved you are by me and so many. Happy birthday TT! Welcome to 30! I can’t wait for all of the memories. This is when life just starts getting good!”
Tristan was spotted entering a bedroom with three women at a party, and a source told Daily Mail that “Tristan took off into one of the party rooms where everyone goes to hook up” with the trio and another man. “They stayed in the room behind closed doors for at least 30 minutes. When he arrived, his shirt looked all pressed and when he came out his shirt was a mess, he looked disheveled.”
 A source spoke to E!, who said, “They had been working through the cheating rumors for the last couple of weeks, but Khloé told Tristan he lost all of her trust and the relationship could not be repaired. Khloé really tried, but ultimately, felt too betrayed by him. She's done and says she will not go back.”
They added, “They have been co-parenting and have seen each other several times in the last week with True, but are not romantically together.”
They continued to co-parent, with a source saying, “Khloé is doing okay. True will always be her first priority, and, ultimately, she's focused on a healthy family for her daughter, so Tristan will always be a part of Khloé's life.”
They added, “She's not one to dwell on the past—she has an incredible capacity to find the positive in every situation. And she and Tristan are still very much in touch and are great co-parents to True.”
InTouch reported that they have reconciled once more, but Khloé denied it.
The Mirror shared  InTouch's report and a Twitter user retweeted the story, writing at Khloé, “At this point @khloekardashian has no self worth. Anyway...”
She responded, “You’re telling me you made an assessment about my life because of a random blog? I think that says more about you than it does about me.”
You’re telling me you made an assessment about my life because of a random blog? I think that says more about you than it does about me.
At some point in the following months, the couple seemingly reconciled again, but kept it very private considering their past. However, news came out that Tristan fathered a child with personal trainer Maralee Nichols, who was suing the basketball player for child support and other pregnancy-related fees.
Nichols alleged in court documents, according to People, that the baby was conceived in March of that year when Tristan and Khoé were still together.
Tristan confirmed in an Instagram Story that he was the father of Nichols' baby, and then publicly apologized to Khloé.
He wrote:
Khloé and Tristan reveal they are expecting a second child together via surrogate, a rep told E! and People. 
The rep said, “We can confirm True will have a sibling who was conceived in November. Khloé is incredibly grateful to the extraordinary surrogate for such a beautiful blessing. We’d like to ask for kindness and privacy so that Khloé can focus on her family.” 
The baby was allegedly conceived before the Nichols scandal was revealed to Khloé and the public, likely in November 2021.
Khloé and Tristan welcomed their second child together via surrogate, People reported, and it's a baby boy. 
Buzzfeed and Entertainment Tonight reported that the pair were secretly engaged when the Nichols news broke. She accepted his proposal in February 2021, a month before he cheated with Nichols. 
Khloé shared photos from her family's famous annual Christmas party, partially revealing her son's face for the first time, but not his name. The Kardashians star was wearing a red satin ballgown made custom by Lebanese designer Nicolas Jebran, with True wearing an outfit in a matching red.
Tristan's mother Andrea Thompson unexpectedly passed away on January 5 after having a heart attack. E! reported that Khloé flew to Toronto to support Tristan right after. “Khloe went with him to comfort and help him navigate what will be a very difficult time,” the source said. “She was incredibly close to his mother.”
E!'s source explained that broken up or not, Khloé remains committed to supporting her ex and co-parent. “Like Khloé and the Kardashian family always do, they will come together and support their loved ones in their most difficult time of need,” the source said. “Tristan is the father of Khloe's kids, and she and her entire family will always be there for him.”
Kim Kardashian and Kris Jenner join Khloé and Tristan for the funeral on January 14, E! reported.
Khloé paid tribute to Andrea on her Instagram, writing that she promised to look after Tristan's younger, teen brother Amari, who suffers from epilepsy.
On Friday, March 10, Khloé Kardashian celebrated her best friends Malika and Khadijah Haqq’s 40th birthday in Los Angeles. She was joined by sisters Kim and Kylie and their mom Kris Jenner. She was also joined by her ex. Thompson reportedly arrived two hours after the gals, but he was wearing sparkling silver sneakers that matched Khloé's silver minidress.
He and Khloé were also seen leaving the event at the same time, around 1 am, though they left through different exits. Khloé exited through the venue's back door, while Thompson left through the front. His appearance at Khloé's best friends' party and in a coordinated ensemble has fans wondering if there's another reconciliation rumor around the corner.
Khloé later posted a birthday tribute to Thompson on March 13, 2023. She had to disable comments to her disappointment, and a source told Us Weekly on March 14 that the post did not mean they were back together.
In the tribute, Kardashian wrote, “Happy birthday @realtristan13. You are truly the best father, brother & uncle. Your love, attention, silly dances, hugs, carpool rides, bed time rituals, the way u show up for them. All of the above means more than you’ll ever know to your family of littles. My birthday wish for u is that u continue to crave change, healing, and transformation. Be strong, be kind, be patient, be free. Continue to Make your soul and your mommy proud. Happy birthday baby daddy.”
A second source told the outlet a day later that Thompson would like to be with Kardashian again though. “Tristan is always trying to get Khloé back, he still loves her and wants to make it work between them,” the source said. “They’re friends and great coparents, but he wants more.” The source did not address Khloé's feelings about this.
In the June 8 episode of The Kardashians, Kardashian revealed some more details about how she and Thompson are handling their co-parenting duties in a conversation with Kris Jenner, saying boundaries are key.
“Tristan and I, we always get along great,” she said. “Him and I have a great friendship relationship, we get along fine, and for my kids, I will put anything to the side.” 
She continued, “What's done is done, so what would I still be holding on to something for? I don't need to ‘punish’ him because I'm not getting back with him.”
Jenner agrees that they seem to have figured out a system as co-parents. 
“When I'm not around, he's here,” Kardashian agreed. “I would rather him be here than the nanny.” 
She continued, “There's still boundaries, I'm definitely putting my foot down around a lot of things. No one's just here chilling if there's no kids involved.”
In a later confessional, she explained more about why that was necessary. 
“These boundaries are so important to put into place with Tristan because we've done this song and dance a handful of times already,” she said. “I've gotten back with him after a cheating scandal, so I don't know if Tristan is under the impression, ‘Oh wow, OK, let's just ride this out and eventually she'll get back with me.’”
She added, “I get why he would think that, so it's my job to set boundaries that my actions show otherwise... it's always about the kids, and that's what it is. But we're not just hanging out by ourselves... I keep it very short and sweet and make sure he knows it's always about the kids because it's so easy to fall back. I can't let those old habits easily come into my life. It's just not what I want.”
On the Thursday, October 5, episode of The Kardashians, Khloé and Kim discussed the former's ongoing support of her ex and his younger brother Amari following the passing of his mother Andrea. In particular, why the two brothers are still living with her while Thompson's home is being renovated. 
“I definitely feel overwhelmed and I guess stressed at times, but I'm not the one going through most of the pain here,” Khloé said in a confessional.
Kim's perspective was complicated.
“I know you guys are gonna hate me for this, and you're gonna hate us, and you're gonna think Khloé's whatever,” she said. “It's so crazy because he's such a good friend and he's such a good dad, but he just couldn’t get it together in that area of being a faithful boyfriend.”
She continued, “You want to obviously hate him for that. Yeah, of course, his actions and who he was are so f---ed up, I can't deny that, and we've had our talks about it and had our fights about it... but he’s also shown so many decent things and has been a really good person and friend.”
She also said the NBA player is supportive of her kids, too, who she shares with former husband Kanye West. Kim claims that Thompson has stepped into a fatherly role with them and defended her when her ex-husband was being publicly combative. 
Later on, Khloé got more specific about why she lets him stay.
“I'm not naïve to fact that my ex-boyfriend is living in my house and that we're in really sensitive times,” she said. “Tristan is in the very fresh stages of grieving [his mom]...”I never want to be someone that anyone can accuse that I misled them when it comes to love. I think I'm so adamant about that because I've been on the receiving end of it and I just don’t think love is something you play with.
She went on, “Tristan has said before [that] I'm his person. I'm not saying I don’t believe him but I've heard this, and of course, it's angered me before because I'm like, ‘If I f---ing am, then why have you treated me like this and how many times?’ I love love, and I am a hopeless romantic, but that's not gonna change how I feel and what happened.”
She added, “We're gonna be in each other's lives for the rest of each other's lives because of our kids, so I'm not gonna fight that, and I'm gonna make sure it's as nice as possible for me.”
In another confessional, she called the multiple cheating scandals “traumatic,” but explained how important it is to her to co-parent their children together. She also sympathized with his loss, having lost her own father at a young age. During the episode, Thompson praised Khloé for her “pure and great” soul and she responded in kind.
“You're a good person at your core, that’s why I was with you,” she said. “Everyone has done dumb s--- in their life, just not everyone does it on a public platform, which sucks ... all of us, we're always rooting for you, we always want the best for you. We believe in you as a person... and just remember, you're not your past.”
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Rami Malek and Emma Corrin’s Complete Relationship Timeline
text:
Rami Malek has found love again with Emma Corrin after his years-long relationship with Lucy Boynton came to a quiet end. The two actors made their romance very official when they were photographed kissing on September 21 in London.
The PDA display comes after the couple was seen together at the US Open, and a source told People in August that Malek started seeing Corrin, who uses they/them pronouns, earlier in the summer. He “has fun” with them, the insider said.
Here, a breakdown of their history together.
Malek, 42, and Corrin, 27, are seen together at a Bruce Springsteen concert in London’s Hyde Park. At this point, his breakup from Lucy Boynton hasn’t been confirmed. 
Malek and Corrin appeared talking close to each other in paparazzi photos from the mid-July concert. Page Six reported that, at one point, Malek rested his hand on Corrin’s knee.
On August 4, The Sun reported Malek and Boynton’s breakup. A source said that since the breakup, Malek has been spending time with friends, including Corrin. In fact, he asked them out to the Springsteen concert.
“Rami and Lucy split earlier this year without much fanfare,” the source said. “They were together for a long time but had grown apart. They are both moving on with their lives and are busy with work. Rami has surrounded himself with his mates and has spent the summer enjoying himself. He asked Emma to join him to watch Bruce at BST last month, and they had a great time. Rami is enjoying life and living it up.”
The Sun reported that Malek and Corrin were seen by fans kissing in a restaurant and holding hands on a walk. Photos of them at dinner were published on the outlet, too.
Their walk happened earlier in August in North London. A witness told The Sun, “They looked very much like a couple.”
Their dinner date was at Buoy and Oyster restaurant in Margate, Kent. An eyewitness there told the outlet that they were quite affectionate.
“Rami and Emma were very low-key and when fans approached them for pictures, they politely declined,” the source said. “They were very passionate and looking into each other’s eyes. They kissed and didn’t seem to mind who could see. Rami and Emma just seemed totally besotted with each other and paid no attention to anyone else.”
Malek and Corrin took their romance to New York City. The couple was seen sitting next to each other at the September 8 matches. They did not show PDA in the pics.
Corrin and Malek made their romance public when paparazzi caught them kissing while they were on a walk in London. An onlooker told Daily Mail that they were “blissfully happy and in love [and] weren’t trying to be discreet or hide their relationship at all.” Corrin wore a tan trench coat, light wash jeans, and a black top. Malek was in an olive sweater, blue baseball cap, and jeans. See photos here. 
The couple were photographed walking along a beach in Kent on Thursday, September 28, leading Corrin's dog Spencer. Malek leaned over to give his partner a kiss on the cheek, then wrapped an arm around them. Later, they played fetch with the pup.
Both were dressed in warm layers, with Malek in a black sweater and a coat over a long white shirt with a collar. He had on baggy jeans, a white baseball cap, and sunglasses. Corrin wore a dark green sweater vest over a lighter green shirt with jeans and a black cross body bag.
On Tuesday, October 3, Malek and Corrin made an appearance at the Miu Miu afterparty in Paris during fashion week. They were wearing outfits in black and gray, seemingly coordinated for the night out. In photos of the couple taken as they left the event, they're both smiling and Malek has his hand on Corrin's back in a sweet gesture.
In another picture, they posed with Euphoria star Sydney Sweeney.
Alyssa Bailey is the senior news and strategy editor at ELLE.com, where she oversees coverage of celebrities and royals (particularly Meghan Markle and Kate Middleton). She previously held positions at InStyle and Cosmopolitan. When she's not working, she loves running around Central Park, making people take #ootd pics of her, and exploring New York City.

title: Kendall Jenner Joins Bad Bunny in Miami After His Billboard Latin Awards Wins
text:
On Friday, Kendall Jenner was photographed in Miami with boyfriend Bad Bunny after the Puerto Rican rapper took home seven wins at the Billboard Latin Music Awards. The couple headed to the SuperBlue art installation together, then went out for dinner at Hometown BBQ. In the images, both are dressed casually, with Jenner in a gray tank and white jeans cinched with a thin black leather belt. 
She left her hair down and wore a pair of narrow black sunglasses. In some photos, her white hair clip is lifting the hem of her shirt, showing a glimpse of torso. On her feet were a pair of white Adidas sneakers.
Bad Bunny wore a white t-shirt, brown pants, and a red and blue bandana around his neck. He had on a backwards brown baseball cap. 
On Thursday, at the BillBoard Latin Music Awards, Bad Bunny received the prestigious Artist of the Year and Tour of the Year awards, as well as Global 200 Latin Song of the Year, Sales Song of the Year for “Tití Me Preguntó,” Top Latin Albums Artist of the Year, Male, Latin Rhythm Artist of the Year, Solo, and Latin Rhythm Song of the Year.
The couple have been fairly private about their relationship, but they went “Gucci ad official” in a new campaign last week. The Kardashian's star posed with her boyfriend in a number of fashion shots for the brand's luggage line, seeming to confirm that at the very least, they're traveling together a lot.
They also appeared at a Gucci show, sitting side-by-side during Milan Fashion Week.
Jenner and Bad Bunny have made other group appearances, largely at restaurants around Los Angeles and once at an L.A. Lakers game sitting courtside with friends. But they still have not spoken openly about their relationship.
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Lindsay Lohan, Amanda Seyfried, and Lacey Chabert Reportedly Filmed a ‘Mean Girls’ Commercial Together
text:
On Friday, a mini-reunion for the classic teen comedy Mean Girls assembled in Los Angeles. The film's stars, Lindsay Lohan, Amanda Seyfried, and Lacey Chabert, were spotted shooting a commercial on a football field dressed in pink, a nod to their characters from the movie. Lohan played Cady Heron in the 2004 film, a naive girl moving to a U.S. high school after growing up in Africa and finding it difficult to navigate a new social hierarchy.
Seyfried and Chabert were a part of “The Plastics,” the most popular clique in school who accept Cady into the fold, only to find their status quickly disintegrating. Their leader was played by Rachel McAdams as the notorious Regina George, but McAdams did not appear to be on set. 
Chabert was photographed in a silver convertible very similar to the one she drove in the original movie, and in another picture Seyfried is talking into a microphone. In Mean Girls, she does the school weather reports. In another photo, Lohan was carrying a bag that reads, “Plastics Club Member,” and the tagline, “On Wednesdays, we wear pink.”
Next year is the 20th anniversary of the movie and it was recently October 3, a date that has a joking significance in the script and which the cast has often marked on social media since its release. Next year is also when Mean Girls Musical Movie is set to hit theaters, an adaptation of the musical of the movie. The new movie and the original were penned by Tina Fey, and she'll be reprising her role as Ms. Norbury in the adaptation. 
The gals have been asked about the likelihood they'd make a cameo in the new Mean Girls and in February, Seyfried told Entertainment Tonight that she was “100 percent into” making an appearance.
“It's been a long legacy for Mean Girls, and I think we all kinda just need to hang,” she said.

title: Simone Biles Becomes the Most Decorated Gymnast Ever With Another Gold Medal
text:
On Friday, Olympic great Simone Biles broke yet another record with her win at the World Artistic Gymnastics Championships in Belgium. The 26-year-old athlete was awarded her sixth all-around world championship gold, making her the most decorated gymnast ever. She was previously tied with Belarus gymnast Vitaly Scherbo, who competed in the 1990s and took home 33 medals. Biles is now at 34. 
It was an emotional moment for Biles as she stood on the podium during the U.S. national anthem, alongside silver winner Rebeca Andrade and bronze winner Shilese Jones. Cameras caught her getting a bit misty-eyed while soaking in the accolades.
“I was emotional because it was my first worlds here, 10 years ago, and then now my sixth one, so it's crazy,” Biles told reporters after the competition. “But I swear, I do have something in my eye that's been bothering me for like four hours and I cannot get it out… So while I was looking up there, it was like a combination of both.”
We're not crying, you're crying. 🥹The national anthem plays for 6-time world all-around champion Simone Biles. 🇺🇸🥇 pic.twitter.com/pp0PQ65KSV
The champion's success is particularly poignant this year. She only returned to competing this summer after stepping back following the 2020 Olympic Games, which were held in Tokyo in 2021. At the time, Biles was experiencing something gymnasts call the “twisties,” a very dangerous change in perception that makes it extremely difficult to land safely when doing their gravity-defying moves in the air. That year, she withdrew from some events effected by the condition, but won bronze at the balance beam final.
During the world championships, Biles has earned two golds so far, including one during the U.S. team final on Wednesday, and she is still set to compete in the women's vault, uneven bars, balance beam, and floor routine. She will likely make her return to the Olympics in Paris which are set for 2024.

title: Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlake’s Full Relationship Timeline
text:
Actress Jessica Biel and pop star Justin Timberlake have been married for ten years and together for almost 16, and they're still going strong. The pair have had their ups and downs, including a brief breakup and even briefer photo scandal. But they recently renewed their vows and share two sons, one of whom was born during COVID-19 lockdown. 
Here's the complete timeline of their relationship thus far.
Shortly after his break up with Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel are seen snowboarding together with a group of friends in Park City, Utah, and some might say even flirting. Biel had just broken up with baseball star Derek Jeter. A source told People that Timberlake was only “trying to have a good time.”
They added, “He is in no way looking to be in a relationship. He's single and he's happy.”
Another source says that Timberlake is “in love” with Biel, adding, “He wants to be with her all the time. He's ready to be serious.”
On the cover of British GQ, Biel calls her very private relationship with Timberlake her “one sparkly present” that she doesn't “want to open in front of strangers.”
“It's the one part of my life that is my own and not for anyone else,” she said at the time.
Rumors start circulating that the couple have broken up, but a source said, “They're together...They're not breaking up. Any time they spend time apart it's because they're working.”
They did add, “Things have been a bit up in the air recently. They've been spending more time apart—more time with each of their friends, and they've been reevaluating [their relationship].”
A few years later, things go from assessing to ending. They decided to end their relationship, but a source stated there were “no hard feelings” and it “was completely mutual, and they both decided it was time to move on.”
Reps confirmed the break up, saying, “Addressing the media speculation regarding Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlake's relationship, we are confirming that they mutually have decided to part ways. The two remain friends and continue to hold the highest level of love and respect for each other.”
In the July issue of Vanity Fair, Timberlake is effusive about his ex.
“She is the single-handedly most significant person in my life,” he says. “In my 30 years, she is the most special person, okay? I don’t want to say much more, because I have to protect things that are dear to me—for instance, her.”
The pair were seen in Toronto enjoying time together at an art deco diner on Queen Street West. An eyewitness said, “They were in good spirits....They seemed happy. They had brunch together. They were talking. They enjoyed their food. They had a nice time.”
A source explained, “They always remained friendly after the split and spent time together.”
The break didn't last too long, though. That November, Biel hinted in an interview with ELLE magazine that they may have reconciled after being asked about her dating life.
“A girl doesn't kiss and tell,” she said. 
A month later, they were engaged. Timberlake proposed to Biel when they visited Montana, which she recounted years later on The Late Late Show.
“We were in Montana on a piece of property that we owned at the time,” Biel recalled. “We had snowboarded all day. It was in the middle of the winter. Waist-high snow. We were [in] head-to-toe snowboarding outfits—hats, gloves, everything.”
Biel continued, “And we go up to the property to just check out how the foundation is looking. And all of a sudden, he gets down onto his knees and just sinks into the snow.” 
In a cover story for InStyle, Biel says Timberlake picked out the ring himself and often helps her style choices.
“I had no say whatsoever [in the ring]. I don’t micromanage,” she said. “He is fearless in his choices and has a real eye for design. And I’ll be honest: He has better taste than I do.”
On October 19, 2012, the couple marry in southern Italy, and like most of their moments, it's quite private.
“I had a little bit of butterflies,” Biel told People about the ceremony. “I was about to stand up in front of my friends and family and bare my soul for the person I love. It was terribly emotional.” 
Timberlake confirmed Biel's pregnancy on January 31, which was also his 34th birthday. He shared a pic of himself kissing Biel's belly, captioning it, “Thank you EVERYONE for the Bday wishes! This year, I'm getting the GREATEST GIFT EVER. CAN'T WAIT. #BoyOrGirl #YouNeverKnow #WeDontEvenKnow #WeAreTakingBets.”
Timberlake celebrates Biel's birthday on Instagram. 
In April, the birth of their baby was confirmed by the couple's publicist to People. The rep added that “mom and baby are doing well and dad is ‘ecstatic.’”
The baby boy was named Silas Randall, and his first photo showed him wearing a Memphis Grizzlies shirt. 
Biel shared something about motherhood with E! News, saying her most magical moment with Silas thus far was “probably the moment he wakes up from a nap. He's sort of looking around and you sort of creep up and look over the crib and he looks up and he goes [big sigh] just a gummy mouth, no teeth, just a big smile, happy that you're alive, and you're just looking at him.”
She added, “You quickly move on from it because there is a dirty diaper in your palm.”
Biel told ELLE.com at the Tiffany Blue Book gala that parenthood changed her style.
“Some days it does feel as though there's no time for anything. Fashion sometimes feels like it goes to the bottom of the list,” she said. “I do feel like I have to make a little bit more of an effort, because it's very easy to just throw on a pair of jeans and a T-shirt and sneakers and just run out the door, because you're doing a million things at once.” 
She continued, “You have to just say: You know what, I'm going to put on my heels, I'm going to put on my dress, and I'm going to do it. You do have to make an effort, I think.”
When asked about Timberlake's style, she replied, “No, nothing's changed for him, he's fine...He always looks great, even when he's sloppy!”
Jessica Biel's 7th Heaven costar Beverley Mitchell told Access Hollywood Live that she was there when they met and sparks flew.
“I was there like the moment the love connection happened,” said Mitchell. “I was like, ‘Okay, this is happening.’ They met, it was at the Golden Globes. It was so cute because they were like—it's that moment like I like you, I think you like me. It was very, very sweet. They were definitely flirting. They were really cute.” 
The actress spoke with ELLE.com at the premiere of her TV series The Sinner, saying her character was informed by her son Silas.
“It's personal for me,” she said. “I wouldn't be able to do this role if I didn't know what it was like to be a mom. If I wouldn't be able to see my son every day...I get emotional just thinking about it.”
That same month, she told Marie Claire, “You think you're a selfless person, and then you realize you're not. These little people come around, and they require so much, and your schedule is really not your own, nor is it important anymore, and it's very clear that it's your life now, revolving around this dude. I'm not that person who feels like, Oh, my whole life changes for my kid, but it does.” 
Biel starred in the video for Timberlake's single “Man of the Woods,” being the babe of the song.
In an interview with Entertainment Tonight Timberlake opened up about needing to go on vocal rest, and how Biel helped him cope with the disappointment of canceling shows.
“I think anybody out there, you know, you go through anything, to have somebody by your side to really go through it with you and get in the mud with you, so to speak, I'm sure you know what that's like,” he said. “It's like once you find that person, it's like a baptism, where you're like, ‘I can't go back,’ you know what I mean? Like, I don't, I can't go back, so, which is what fatherhood's like too.”
Biel also spoke to Entertainment Tonight, and shared how she knew that Timberlake was the one. 
“I knew that he was my person early on, but we were so young,” she said. “There wasn't any big risks being taken. There wasn't anything... really putting anything on the line. We were just hanging out. I think before we got married, that's when I was like, ‘Oh yeah, this is the person I want to be in the boat with when we hit the rapids, because we're going to hit the rapids and we're going to have to hold on tight. Can you row? Because I can row, I think you can row, let's try this.’”
Biel added, “It was like that early on in our relationship and when you're married for the first time you go, ‘Okay. You can't just jump out of this thing.’”
In 2019, pics were leaked of Timberlake holding hands with his Palmer co-star Alisha Wainwright, and Us Weekly reported that Biel pushed him to apologize publicly.
“Jessica encouraged Justin to put out his statement on Instagram because she felt embarrassed by his actions and wanted him to take accountability,” a source said. “Jessica was very upset and embarrassed by Justin's behavior. [But] they are still united, very much together and strong.”
Wainwright's rep denied anything happened between them, as did he in his statement. He wrote:
Before the couple confirmed it, The Daily Mail reported the couple had welcome a second child. 
A few months later, Timberlake's former *NSYNC colleague Lance Bass told Entertainment Tonight,  “The baby is cute of course; it's Justin and Jessica!”
While he spilled those beans, he did not reveal the baby's name, adding, “Justin would kill me!”
Timberlake's friend and collaborator, Brian McKnight also confirmed the child's existence in an interview with Hollywood Life.
“Having kids and having his family, I think [Justin] took some time to focus on those things because those things are very important,” he said. “I think if he’s going to do music, he’s going to make sure that that's secure, and then he'll bring us into his music. And being inspired! He just had a new baby. I think that's going to be really inspiring for him and he'll have some new music based on that, I'm sure.”
Timberlake confirmed he had a new baby himself while speaking to Ellen DeGeneres on her former talk show, a son named Phineas.
“He's awesome and so cute. Nobody's sleeping,” Timberlake said. “But we're thrilled. We're thrilled and couldn't be happier. Very grateful.” 
In June, Biel went on Dax Shepard's Armchair Expert podcast, and talked about having a baby during lockdown. 
“I had, like, a secret COVID baby,” she explained. “It wasn't like it was supposed to be a secret. It was just COVID happened, and then I went to Montana with my family and never left.”
With the pandemic, the couple spent more and more time in Montana and ended up listing their home in the Hollywood Hills home for $35 million.
“They're rarely in L.A. and are happy to live in Montana,” a source told People. “They also still have a place on the East Coast.”
Timberlake posted on Instagram for Biel's 40th birthday, and wrote on his Story, “Whether it's laid up on a couch, kicking my ass at the gym or, dressing up at ridiculous costume parties... you make it all look good. I love you and I celebrate you every day.”
Biel revealed on The Ellen DeGeneres Show that her husband threw her a huge birthday party for the milestone birthday and covered a bunch of her favorite songs.
“He's just my favorite....He threw me such an amazing, amazing party. And he flew his band in and he performed for me,” she gushed. “Look, I will go head-to-head with everybody, but I'm his No. 1 fan. And I mean, who do I want to see on my birthday? It's him and his band. He's my favorite.”
She added, “Everything from Feist to Radio Head to Donny Hathaway ... it just goes on and on.”
During the premiere of her Hulu series Candy, Biel told Entertainment Tonight why her relationship with Timberlake is going strong ten years later.
“It's a really good question, right?” she said. “Well, I'll have to give Justin the credit in this moment, for this one thing that he always says to me: ‘We might be married, but we have to keep dating,’ and it's so true. You just have to keep making time for each other and you have to keep making each other a priority. And do the things that you love together.”
“It's not always easy, as we all know, but those touch point moments make all the hard times palatable,” she added.
Timberlake even made a cameo in the series as Deputy Steve Deffibaugh, a part he volunteered for after reading the show's script.
“He said, ‘Oh, who's playing this character?’ I said, ‘Oh, I don't know, probably somebody local. We don't have any money left,’” Biel said. “And he goes, “I want to play it.’”
The official anniversary of ten years of marriage was that October, and Timberlake posted,  “10 years ain't enough! You make me a better husband and father every day! I love you so much you beautiful human! Run it back!”
Biel shared a carousel of images as well, writing, “Being married to you is the adventure of a lifetime! Run it back, baby. RUN IT BACK. I love you.”
Biel's post revealed that the couple had a vow renewal ceremony when she reshared it in a Story, writing, “From our wedding vow renewal this summer—in Italy where it all went down.”
She went on Today and described the ceremony as “very intimate” with just a “couple of friends.”
“We almost canceled it,” Biel said. “We thought, ‘This is silly, are we going to feel goofy doing this?’ And actually, it was so moving. I felt like, ‘Wow, we're going to keep doing this. Look at us!’ It felt really nice.”
She added  of her marriage, “It feels so, I don't know, a combination of incredibly safe and just deep understanding of another person.”
Biel celebrated Timberlake's 42nd birthday, writing, “Happy birthday to the person who challenges and inspires me every day. The person who keeps me laughing and creating and risking it all. The person who makes the ordinary extraordinary. You know who you are. I love you.”
Timberlake fêted Biel's 41st birthday with his own Instagram tribute to her, featuring a carousel of couple pics. “Let me tell y’all about this human… she is the most badass, most graceful, most gorgeous DREAM of a partner I could have ever wished for,” he wrote in his caption. “And today is her bday! I’m so glad you were born, my love. And, I’m so lucky that you are choosing to do this thing called life with me. Aging like a FINE🍷!!!! I love you to the moon and back. —Huz.”
Later that month, on Thursday, March 23, the pair were at the final night of SZA's SOS Tour in Los Angeles. On his Instagram Stores, Timberlake shared a photo of their tickets to the concert at The Kia Forum, with the words “Date night” over it, even tagging SZA herself. There were also some video shots of them dancing and enjoying themselves during the show.
In October, photos came out of Biel and Timberlake on a vacation in Italy, the country where they were married and where they celebrated their 10-year vow renewal ceremony last year. The couple were seen with sons Silas, 8, and Phineas, 3, in Venice and Rome exploring the city’s catacombs and going shopping. In several pics, they're holding hands or embracing sweetly.
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Sofia Vergara Is 'Doing Great' After Split From Joe Manganiello
text:
On Friday, Sofia Vergara's good friend Julie Bowen spoke with People while attending the Step Up Inspiration Awards and was asked about her Modern Family co-star of 11 years. Bowen said that she will “always” support her friend, and that she has been seeing Vergara thrive after her breakup with Joe Manganiello.
“Her Instagram says it all,” Bowen claimed. “We have spoken, and she's doing great. Sofia has always had such a wonderful family that surrounds her and wonderful friends,” before adding jokingly, “She doesn't need Taylor Swift to take her to a game.” 
Bowen added, “She's good. But I'm super happy that all those other girls are going to games with T Swifty. I wish she had been around for me.”
She shared more about their longstanding working relationship and the close friendship that developed over their many years together on the hugely popular ABC sitcom.
“Sofia has always been my role model as far as embracing being a woman and womanly, and yet also being powerful and not,” said Bowen. “I always felt like you had to compromise one for the other.” 
The actress has been asked about her friend quite a bit. In August, she told E! News that Vergara does everything “with grace.”
“And she rises above and she just goes forward. She's warm and generous and giving to everybody around her,” Bowen continued. “I have no doubt that if she wishes to be in a relationship she will be, but she sure don't need one.”
Vergara and Manganiello were married for seven years, and split shortly before her 51st birthday, which she celebrated with friends in Italy and without her husband or wedding ring. Manganiello was the one who officially filed for divorce, citing “irreconcilable differences.”
In a statement to Page Six, the former couple said, “We have made the difficult decision to divorce. As two people that love and care for one another very much, we politely ask for respect for our privacy at this time as we navigate this new phase of our lives.” 
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Rihanna Wears Tie-Front Top With Denim Ensemble on Date With A$AP Rocky
text:
On Friday, Rihanna stepped out with boyfriend A$AP Rocky in New York City. The couple were spotted leaving a hotel together in their early fall looks. The Fenty Beauty founder was wearing a tie-front top that offered a glimpse of her torso and a peek at her lacy black bra where the shirt's low neckline was unbuttoned. Over it, she wore a denim jacket with the shirt's cuffs hanging out and wide-legged jeans in the same wash. 
On her feet were a pair of black heels, and she accessorized with earrings, some chains around her neck, and black sunglasses. Rihanna's hair hung in slight waves around her, and she flashed a red manicure.
The rapper also wore a matching jacket and slacks, both in a loose summer cut in a beige shade. Under the jacket he wore a white tee, and over one shoulder A$AP carried a woven green leather purse. He also had on sunglasses, a chain necklace and wore black boots. 
The parents welcomed their first son, RZA Athelston Mayers, in May of 2022. Their second child came just a few months ago, another son who they reportedly named Riot. 
After her first child was born, Rihanna told British Vogue that the experience “was beautiful” and that she felt “blessed,” but it was still a huge transition. 
“Essentially, from one person I became two,” she said. “You walk into the hospital as a couple and leave as a family of three. It’s nuts.”
She added that “you don't sleep. At all. Not even if you wanted to.”
“We came home, cold turkey, had no one,” the ANTI singer went on. “It was just us as parents and our baby. Man, you're a zombie for the most part.”
When asked about her notably excellent maternity style, Rihanna said it was much harder to figure out how to dress postpartum.
“Dressing for pregnancy was such a piece of cake,” she said. “But dressing in postpartum, what the f-ck do you do? The week that I came home from the hospital—that was nothing but sweats and hoodies.”
She continued, “You kind of just gotta wait it out otherwise you end up buying so many clothes you’re not going to use. Well, unless you get pregnant again.”
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Julia Fox States Kanye West ‘Weaponized’ Her Against the Kardashians When They Dated
text:
With the imminent release of her memoir, Down the Drain, Julia Fox has been sharing more details of her personal life that have caused a lot of conjecture before, particularly about her relationship with Kanye West. In an interview on Friday with The Los Angeles Times, Fox shared that when she and the rapper were linked in 2022, she felt he “weaponized” her against his former wife, Kim Kardashian. 
“I thought ultimately I’d be helping a precarious situation, but I learned very quickly that I was being weaponized,” she claimed.
She added that she “really understood” West “on a visceral level” and thought their connection “could be something real,” but he did not treat her as she expected to be treated.
Fox stated, “I just felt like his little puppet.”
The memoir will share some more details on the time she spent with West, though she says she “went lightly” on him. However, she never signed a non-disclosure agreement.
“I’m not signing a f-cking NDA just on principle,” she said. “I never have, and I never will... Unless it’s a professional opportunity, then sure.”
West and Fox only dated briefly, but she still said she believes that the relationship interfered with certain opportunities. The rapper was himself dropped from a number of brand deals following his very public anti-Semitic comments.
“I know for a fact I’ve been up for certain things and couldn’t do it because of dating Kanye. It’s kind of wild,” she said. “It really wasn’t that big of a deal, but other people made it such a big deal.”
After they broke it off, Fox said she stopped dating for a while. She focused on her two-year-old son Valentino, who she shares with ex-husband Peter Artemiev.
“That romanticized idea of men doesn’t exist anymore,” she said. “All the validation I could ever get, I get from my son—the love, the intimacy, the closeness. We co-sleep at night. I have all of that. I wouldn’t want anyone to come in and take my attention or time away from my son.” 
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Travis Kelce Says He Feels ‘On Top of the World’ as Taylor Swift Romance Progresses
text:
On Friday, Travis Kelce was grilled about his budding relationship with pop star Taylor Swift, and he had nothing but good news to share. The Kansas City Chiefs player came out for an interview at the team's practice facility, sharing how it feels to be at the center of so much speculation.
“As all the attention comes it feels like, you know, I was on top of the world after the Super Bowl and right now even more on top of the world,” he told reporters. “It's fun.”
Swift has attended two games to see her rumored love interest, one at Arrowhead Stadium and another last weekend at MetLife Stadium, where the Chiefs faced off against the New York Jets. At the October 1 game, she brought friends Blake Lively, Ryan Reynolds, Sabrina Carpenter, Sophie Turner, and Hugh Jackman, adding to the spectacle. These appearances have sparked even more intense interest in the potential couple.
“We're learning with the paparazzi just taking photos from all over the place, but at the same time it comes with it,” Kelce continued. “You got a lot of people that care about Taylor and for good reason.”
Video of everything Travis Kelce said today about Taylor Swift, Pfizer backlash, his b-day and focusing on football:"I was on top of the world after the Super Bowl, and now even more so.""You've got a lot of people that care about Taylor, for good reason." #ChiefsKingdom @KCTV5 pic.twitter.com/qIRzyAleAd
He added, “Just gotta keep living and learning and enjoying the moments. At the end of the day, I've always been pretty good about compartmentalizing and being able to stay focused in this building. So I'll just keep rolling with that.”
Some NFL fans have expressed annoyance on social media about the Swift mania, suggesting it's a distraction from the game. However, Kelce said he is only interested in the opinion of his teammates, and they are supposedly enjoying the attention as well. 
“Everybody's having fun with it, you know? Whether I think they're overdoing it or not, I know I brought this to myself,” he said. “I've been fortunate enough to have with it. That's all that matters, that it's not pissing anybody off, over here at least.” 
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez Have Finalized Their Divorce Just Weeks After Filing
text:
Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez filed for divorce last month, and just a few weeks later their marriage has reportedly ended. The former couple had a prenup, according to TMZ, and there will be no spousal support. 
A source told Page Six, “Ariana and Dalton really wanted to take care of each through all of this and make it as easy on one another as possible—which is why they really took their time with everything.”
The insider added, “They have a strong mutual respect for eachother.”
Gomez is reportedly receiving $1,250,000, tax-free, as well as half of the net proceeds from the sale of their home in Los Angeles. Grande is also obligated to pay up to $25,000 of her ex-husband's attorney fees. He is also entitled to continued 24-hour security. The settlement has been filed and simply awaits a judge's signature.
Another source told TMZ, “There is still a strong mutual love and respect between Ariana and Dalton and they wanted to make sure everything was done right in lockstep with one another.”
Both Grande and Gomez have moved on, the latter is said to be dating, and it's well-known that Grande is in a relationship with her Wicked co-star, Ethan Slater. 
On their documents, Grande and Gomez dated their separation as being February 20, 2023. However, their marital issues allegedly began long before.
“They came to the decision together,” another source said in July. “They were having problems before January, but they want to remain best friends.”
They added that Gomez visited Grande in London as she filmed her upcoming musical film adaptation, but it “didn't work out.”
“They’ve been really good friends throughout the entire process, and their friends and families have been trying to protect them,” the source added.
Aimée Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.
